author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA WEAKENS A LITTLE MORE... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...PRISCILLA WEAKENS A LITTLE MORE... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 AM MST Thu Oct 09 the center of Priscilla was located near 23.8, -114.7 with movement NNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
